Projects Blog About
Kitsu

Kitsu is a discord bot that generates custom statistics on member and room activity for each guild. This allows administrators to have a better visibility on the guild activity, peak and off-peak hours, active and dead days etc...

RustGolangDockerPostgreSQL
Memnix

Memnix is a project that aims to create tools to facilitate learning for students by working in an organized way.
